abstract: Gerald Marzorati is answering questions from readers Aug. 24-28, 2009.
snippet: Gerald Marzorati is answering questions from readers Aug. 24-28, 2009.
lead_paragraph: Gerald Marzorati, assistant managing editor at The Times and editor of The Times Magazine is answering questions from readers on the weekly magazine, the T Style magazines and other topics Aug. 24-28, 2009. He previously answered questions in July 2006. Questions may be e-mailed to askthetimes@nytimes.com.

headline.main: Talk to the Times: Assistant Managing Editor Gerald Marzorati
